meanings.definition: A fuel consisting of a single type of substance.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of monofuels for his research project.
meanings.sent2: The car engine was designed to run on monofuels for optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: The monofuels in the tank seemed to whisper to each other, 'We are the chosen ones!'
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to using only monofuels in her cooking was like a beacon of simplicity in a world of complexity.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the monofuels made them stand out among the other fuels.

meanings.definition: The use of monofuels in engines.
meanings.sent1: The company invested in research to improve the efficiency of monofuels in engines.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic recommended using monofuels to reduce engine maintenance costs.
meanings.sent3: The monofuels in the engine seemed to have a secret dance party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The idea of using monofuels in engines was a spark of innovation in the automotive industry.
meanings.sent5: The smooth operation of the engine was attributed to the quality of the monofuels used.
